LanguageData.RocketHEAT.label: 破甲
LanguageData.RocketHEAT.description: Shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.
LanguageData.RocketThermobaric.label: 温压
LanguageData.RocketThermobaric.description: Disperses and subsequently ignites a fuel-air explosive mix, creating a powerful explosion and potentially igniting flammable objects.
LanguageData.RocketFrag.label: 破片
LanguageData.RocketFrag.description: Designed to explode into a cloud of deadly shrapnel, shredding soft targets in a large area.
